short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Message and file encryption suite for e-mail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MagicPad is an end-to-end solution for text and file encryption suite.

Using plain English, MagicPad allows you to create key pairs, share and search for public keys, encrypt and decrypt messages and files, and embed encrypted messages into images as stegnographs.

MagicPad is compatible with any PGP keys and PGP encrypted content.

No data collection, open source, and free!
